cabins.name: Trailhead Haven
cabins.description: Cozy one-bedroom cabin perfect for couples or small families. Features a full kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, and private deck with mountain views. Located just steps from the restaurant and hiking trails.
cabins.shortDescription: Intimate one-bedroom retreat with fireplace and mountain views

cabins.name: Summit's Edge Lodge
cabins.description: Spacious two-bedroom cabin ideal for families or groups. Features two bathrooms, full kitchen, living room with fireplace, and large deck. Sleeps up to 6 guests comfortably with room to spread out.
cabins.shortDescription: Family-friendly two-bedroom cabin with modern amenities

cabins.name: Eagle's Nest Retreat
cabins.description: Our largest and most luxurious cabin with three bedrooms and two bathrooms. Perfect for large families or groups up to 8 people. Features include full kitchen, spacious living area with fireplace, wrap-around deck, private hot tub, and stunning panoramic mountain views.
cabins.shortDescription: Luxury three-bedroom cabin with hot tub and panoramic views

cabins.name: Whispering Pines Studio
cabins.description: Charming studio cabin perfect for couples or solo travelers with furry friends. This pet-friendly retreat features a full kitchen, comfortable queen bed, and cozy living space. Efficient heating keeps you warm, and the private deck offers forest views. Your four-legged companions are welcome here!
cabins.shortDescription: Cozy pet-friendly studio with all the essentials

cabins.name: Stargazer's Sanctuary
cabins.description: Two-bedroom cabin designed for those who love the night sky. Features a premium wrap-around deck with unobstructed views, perfect for astronomy and stargazing. Includes full kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, private hot tub, and telescope-friendly outdoor space. Located on the quietest part of our property for minimal light pollution.
cabins.shortDescription: Premium two-bedroom cabin with exceptional stargazing deck
